title: South Korea Car Finance Market Is Expected to Reach $43.68 Billion by 2030: AMR - Yahoo Finance
content: South Korea Car Finance Market Is Expected to Reach $43.68 Billion by 2030: AMR  Yahoo Finance
description: Significant upgrades in automotive loans and financing servicing among various banks in the country, availability of variety of car financing services offerings provided by prominent banks through online and mobile platforms, remarkable surge in the adoption of electric vehicles, and increase in the number of mobile-first customers for seamless financing are expected to drive the growth of the South Korea car finance market.Portland, OR, May 18, 2022 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to the report p
